description:
Food delivery & much more!

YOUR FAVORITES
Star your favorite stores to keep them at the top of your screen - for easy access.

SCHEDULE DELIVERIES
Let us know when you need your food at 1:15 pm in five days, as precise as that sounds.

SAME ORDER, DIFFERENT DAY
Get your dose of a large cappuccino with skimmed milk, easy on the foam, one click away, every day.

YOUR PREFERENCES, SAVED
Save your payment information securely and your best friend’s home address, just once, because who wants to type that in every. single. time?

REAL-TIME TRACKING
Watch your order arriving: from confirmation to preparation and on the way to almost there. We get hangry and impatient too.

WE’RE HERE FOR YOU
Reach out to us. Five-star service gets you what you need, right when you need it.

GET REWARDED
With Toters Rewards, earn points and redeem them through a wide range of offers, discounts, free meals and benefits. More orders means more rewards!

GET ANYTHING DELIVERED
With our Butler service, we can pick up or buy and deliver anything that fits on a bike.
WE’RE ALREADY THERE - with more than just lunch

Business trip to Lebanon, Iraq, or the U.S.? You guessed it. We’re already there.

NextGrab makes it easy to save money and fight waste!

Discover surprise bags filled with amazing items from local businesses at a fraction of the price. From delicious treats to unique products, you never know what great finds you’ll uncover.

Support local businesses
Get amazing deals
Help reduce waste and make a positive impact

Join the movement. Download NextGrab today and start grabbing surprises near you!

Your marketplace in your pocket. Whether it’s groceries for tonight’s dinner, premium beauty finds, home & living must-haves, sports gear, toys & games, or the latest electronics—noknok delivers it all in 30 minutes or less.

From everyday essentials to exclusive and imported products you won’t find elsewhere, noknok brings endless variety straight to your door. One cart, one touch, one super-fast delivery.


Why noknok?

-Fast delivery — Less than 30 minutes. 
-One-stop destination: Groceries, Premium Beauty, Electronics, Sports, Home & Living, Toys & Games & more
-Exclusive & imported products alongside local favorites
-Competitive prices you’ll love
-Live inventory: what you see is what you get
Wide coverage: Beirut, Greater Beirut, Baabda, Metn, Mount Lebanon, Keserwan, Tripoli… and expanding
Track your order live from checkout to doorstep


We’re growing fast — not just across Lebanon but internationally (yes, you can find noknok in Ghana too).
Stay tuned for new categories, new destinations, and even more of the everything-you-need experience.

Follow us for the latest drops, deals, and exclusive launches:
-Instagram: @noknok.app
-Facebook: @noknok
-YouTube: @noknok-app
-TikTok: @noknokapp

Discover and book your perfect dining experience with Plate - the ultimate restaurant reservation app that puts the world's finest restaurants at your fingertips.

What Makes Plate Special:
Smart Restaurant Discovery - Find hidden gems and popular spots based on your location, cuisine preferences, and dining style
Instant Table Booking - Reserve tables in seconds with real-time availability updates
Waitlist Management - Join waitlists for busy restaurants and get notified when your table is ready
Personalized Recommendations - Get curated suggestions based on your dining history and preferences
Calendar Integration - Seamlessly add reservations to your calendar with automatic reminders
Guest Management - Easily manage group bookings and share reservations with friends

Key Features:
Real-time Availability - See live table availability and book instantly
Location-based Search - Find restaurants near you with integrated maps
Cuisine Categories - Browse by cuisine type, price range, and dining atmosphere
User Reviews & Ratings - Make informed decisions with authentic diner experiences
Loyalty Program - Earn rewards and exclusive offers at your favorite restaurants
Social Features - Share your dining experiences and discover new places through friends

Perfect For:
Food enthusiasts exploring new culinary experiences
Busy professionals who need quick, reliable reservations
Groups planning special occasions and celebrations
Travelers discovering local dining gems
Anyone who loves great food and seamless dining experiences

Download now and start your culinary journey!

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

bartartine is home to hearty food and artisanal French bread and pastries. The finest ingredients, traditional techniques and original recipes come together in the hands of expert chefs to deliver the most authentic flavors and experiences. Longing for baked goods, fresh tartines and healthy dining alternatives delivered right to your doorsteps? Let the ordering begin and explore the contactless option to enjoy a seamless delivery experience.

By Using BK Lebanon Mobile App, you will be able to order, pay, receive and unlock secret deals from burger king with a click of a button!
 
Features
---------------------------
-  Order Online
-  Quick and easy to use
-  Customize and save your favorite items
-  Save multiple delivery addresses
-  Schedule your orders
-  Multiple payment methods (online credit cards, cash on delivery and credit card on delivery)
-  Send orders to your friends and relatives
-  View your order history and track your orders.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

About GOZILLA
Gozilla is Lebanon’s all-in-one delivery APP, giving you access to 1,300+ Restaurants, 300+ Shops, and the widest selection of groceries and daily essentials. From food delivery to Pet Care, Baby products, Flower Shops, Beauty, wellness, and even Pest Control, Gozilla brings everything you need straight to your doorstep. GOZILLA is the only app in Lebanon that has a 5.99$/Month subscription for unlimited FREE delivery.
Key Features
Food & Restaurants: Explore over 1,300 restaurants with endless cuisines and top deals.
Groceries & Essentials: Shop from the widest variety of fresh food, pantry items, and daily needs.
Shops & Services: Access over 300 stores across multiple categories.
Pet Care: Food, treats, and accessories for your pets delivered to your door.
Baby Care: Diapers, formula, and baby essentials made easy.
Beauty & Health: Skincare, cosmetics, supplements, and personal care at your fingertips.
Home & Electronics: Order home appliances, gadgets, and everyday electronics with ease.
Wellness Products: Find everything you need to stay balanced and healthy.
Flower Shops: Fresh flowers and gifts for every occasion.
Pest Control Services: Reliable home care solutions booked directly from the app.
Exclusive Rewards: Earn points with every order, climb the ranks, and unlock discounts.
Easy Payments: Pay your way with secure options and track every order live.
Why Choose GOZILLA
1,300+ restaurants, 300+ shops and widest grocery selection in Lebanon in one app.
5.99$/Month for unlimited FREE delivery
Five-star support
Fast and reliable delivery you can count on, with real-time order tracking.
Rewards, discounts, and exclusive offers—enjoy up to 50% off with monster deals and monthly Buy 1 Get 1 offers.
Order, earn, and save: Gozicoins make every delivery more rewarding


Whether you’re ordering dinner, restocking groceries, sending flowers, or handling home essentials, Gozilla makes life easier, faster, and more rewarding.
Download Gozilla today and experience convenience beyond food.

Craving something delicious? Now you can enjoy your favourite Domino's Pizza in MENA Region across Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA), United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar (QAT), Bahrain (BAH), Oman (OMN), Lebanon (LBN), Jordan (JOR), Egypt (EGY) & Morocco (MAR). 

Domino’s Pizza is here to bring the best pizza experience, be it In Store Dine In, Take Away or Delivered to your doorstep. With our easy-to-use app, you can unlock exclusive offers and deals, and have a wide range of mouth-watering pizzas, chicken delights, breads, sides, deserts and drinks. Order now through the Domino’s app and enjoy unbeatable value and deals! Whether it’s a family feast or a solo indulgence, Domino’s have you covered!

Domino’s Middle east and North Africa app makes your ordering simple and personalized, follow just a few steps:

1.	Download the Domino’s Pizza App and unlock a world of delicious possibilities!   
2.	Discover exclusive, mouth-watering offers just for you — don’t miss out!
3.	Log in for a seamless experience with your saved addresses, or order as a guest for total convenience.
4.	Decide your way — choose delivery or carryout, it is all about what you are in the mood for!
5.	Set your location and share your delivery details in a snap.
6.	Personalize your pizza and sides however you like, then fill up your cart with all your cravings!
7.	Head to checkout and enjoy a quick, secure payment process.
8.	Track your order in real-time as it speeds its way to you with our fast delivery.
9.	Savor every bite of hot, fresh, and absolutely irresistible food, delivered straight to your door!

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Fantuan - Your All-in-One Local Lifestyle Platform
Discover Fantuan, the premier platform designed for international communities across Canada, the US, Australia, and the UK. We connect you to the richness of your neighborhood through convenient services and exclusive local experiences – all in one place.
Explore Fantuan Services:
Dine-in Deals & Restaurant Discovery:
Save on Dining: Enjoy exclusive discounts and vouchers for popular restaurants. Order & pay in the app, scan to redeem in-store – simple and affordable.
Discover with Confidence: Read genuine user reviews and see photo notes to find top-rated spots and avoid disappointments.
Wide Range of Venues: Find deals for restaurants (Chinese, Hotpot, Bubble Tea), entertainment (KTV, Escape Rooms), and services (Salons, Spas, Pet Care).
Available in Major Cities: Including Vancouver, Toronto, New York, Los Angeles, Chicago and expanding.
Fantuan Errands (On-Demand Help):
Need a parcel delivered? Forgot something from the store? Fantuan Errands is your solution.
We handle deliveries and pickups for documents, keys, groceries, flowers, and more. Just tell us what you need!
TT Mart (Groceries & Essentials Delivered):
Order fresh produce, pantry staples, snacks, drinks, and daily essentials right from the Fantuan app.
Enjoy scheduled delivery for your convenience.
Food Delivery (Streamlined Service):
Access convenient food delivery from a wide selection of local and Asian restaurants.
Why Choose Fantuan?
One-Stop Convenience: Handle dining, errands, groceries, and more from a single app.
Save Money: Great deals on dining out and services.
Trusted Insights: Real user reviews help you make informed choices.
Flexible Payments: Pay easily with Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, PayPal, Venmo, Cash, Alipay, or WeChat Pay.
Dedicated Support: Our customer service team is here to assist you.
Partner with Fantuan
For Businesses: Grow your reach! Join us: https://merchant.fantuanorder.com/
Delivery & Errand Partners: Earn flexibly! Sign up: https://delivery.fantuan.ca/#/registration
Contact Us
Order Support:
Canada: +1 7784022900
United States: +1 2134591886
Australia: +61 370678999
United Kingdom: +44 8000584061
General Inquiries: Email feedback@fantuan.ca
About Fantuan
Founded in Vancouver, Canada in 2014 with the mission "life made easier," Fantuan is a technology company building a one-stop platform that connects people with their local communities. Operating in major cities across Canada, the US, Australia, and the UK, Fantuan empowers users to unlock the best of their neighborhood. From discovering deals and services to convenient deliveries, Fantuan brings communities closer together. Recognized as one of Deloitte Canada's Fast 50 companies.

تطبيق ديوان هايبرماركت هو متجرك لشراء البقالة اليومية في متناول اليد بسهولة وأمان


أرسل طلباتك بخطوات بسيطة وسوف يتم تحضيرها على الفور من أقرب فرع لنا إلى عنوانك في بيروت. وسيتم تسليمها بأسرع وقت والخدمة مجانية

حافظ على صحتك وتجنب زحمة السير واستمتع بالتسوق من منزلك الثاني

يقدم تطبيق ديوان هايبر ماركت الخدمات التالية:

- لائحة اصناف البقالة وادوات التنظيف والمخبز والمحمصة واللحوم والدواجن
- لائحة الأصناف المفضلة
- وصفات طعام
- العروضات
- تعريف عدة عناوين
- برنامج الولاء
- الدفع عند الاستلام
- الطلبات المجدولة
- متوفر باللغة العربية والإنكليزية

إذا كنت تستمتع بـاستعمال تطبيق ديوان هايبرماركت ، فالرجاء تخصيص بعض الوقت لتقييمنا. شكرا لدعمكم!

خدمة تطبيق ديوان هايبر ماركت متوفرة في لبنان ، بيروت الكبرى
